website_summaries.verdict: A reliable choice if you need an extra-sturdy kennel for a large dog. Otherwise, it might not be practical.
pros: Has a strong steel frame and thick plastic tray
It's set on wheels that make it easy to move, yet lock when stability is needed
cons: At more than $200, it's the most expensive model we reviewed

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but good
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 70 lb GSD whose an escape artist. She has been able to literally take apart and down wire crates. Downside to this crate is the latches are poor design which weve additionally secured with carabiners. And the pan doest not latch in which means she can simply push it out to get to the carpet. Ive secured the pan with sheet metal and screws. Just need a Phillips driver to remove the pan is all. Shes not been able to do anything with the bars. Shes now secure and her anxiety has gone down.
customer_reviews.author: Nic Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Okay quality, had to make upgrades
customer_reviews.text: As far as dog kennels go the quality was decent, but our doberman immediately broke out of this by nudging the door until the screws came loose and the latches undone. Honestly, we didn't want to return it because it was such a pain in the ass to set up and would be a bigger pain in the ass to ship back. So, we've had to add some wrap around locks to keep him in and regularly have to tighten the screws. One positive, I really like that the bottom slides out for easy access to clean. However, the floor isn't extremely comfortable for my dog since there are gaps between the bars. I don't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This crate is terrible and very poorly constructed. I purchased it since my German Shepherd bent her other one. She does not try to escape it, she just gets super excited when we come home and bounces in her crate. This big bar is a support bar on the bottom and arrived like that. After one day of use, one of the metal thin bars where my girl walks at broke and is sticking straight up. I have decided to send it back and go another route.
customer_reviews.author: Karissa

customer_reviews.title: Packaged good and that's about it
customer_reviews.text: Packaged good and that's about it. 5 mins into building it and I'm not impressed. Provided screws for the locking mechanism on the front don't fit flush so I can not lock/unlock the entrance. All screws sit at a different "flushness" and do not allow the lock to smoothly operate. While building, the quality is inconsistent. Holes for bolts don't line up, scratches everywhere. I had to improvise to make the latches be able to shut. The size chart is wrong, 2XL is about double the size a husky needs. My two full grown could fit in their comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Adam B.

customer_reviews.title: Loud and flimsy. Hard to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Very loud crate, plus the top isn't supported very well so we had to attach it to the sides with zip ties so it wouldn't fall on our dog. Several of the grates on the bottom broke in the first couple of months that we had it, so now I will have to weld it or else my dog will inevitably get hurt. Also, if your dog poops in the crate and it gets between the grates, it is pretty much impossible to clean out without spraying it down. Was expecting much better quality for the price. This is not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Yana

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy yet easy to move
customer_reviews.text: My dog ate his way through the plastic airline crate! He happily runs to "jail" now--this crate is his safe place and we are happy because he doesn't destroy the house!! The only issue I have is that you cannot have your dog wear a collar with a tag--the tag gets caught in the bottom bars. My guy is strong enough--he's broken the ring and gotten free, leaving the tag on the tray underneath the crate. But another dog could get caught. Please be careful. We got him a new collar that has the phone/name embroidered on the collar directly fwiw.
customer_reviews.author: spacegeek

customer_reviews.title: Needs better quality control.
customer_reviews.text: My unit came with missing paint, the catch tray was dented and had to be straightened out, a hole that wasn't fully punched out, and a weld that had sharp metal sticking out of it. even after all that it took about a half an hour to assemble. Having my own tools helped with the issues. Normally this wouldn't bother me, but for the price I expected better. As far as the unit itself, it's sturdy and the locks seem fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dan C

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Love the rolling feature...unfortunately, the middle support bar broke within a couple weeks. I went to home depot and brought steel slats to hold up the bottom and that seemed to work. Then, within the last month, the grate bottom is breaking. We've had it for about 9 months. I have a Rottweiler in it.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Lensi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed and will not purchase from them again!
customer_reviews.text: Update: This company has contacted and asked for photos which I have sent multiple times and even to the email they provided and they have just ignored all emails. I would not purchase from them again. After spending over $200 on this cage for my German Shepherd I was disappointed when I was almost done putting it together to see the many missing paint chips (which I only took a few of) and the dents in the square tubing and metal pan. The only thing I could even give 5 stars on was the ease of assembly. Very disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed..
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible cage. I ordered two. They both came without hardware to put the cage together. My husband had to find his own bolts to put it together and the second one we bought looked like it was ran over by a car.. we returned that one. I contacted customer service and nobody got back to me. Also my dog escapes the cage all the time. Very very disappointed that they have not fixed the latch issue and that both cages came without hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this crate and it arrived damaged, broken hinge, bent bars, dented tray and missing pieces. I contacted the seller with details and pictures, was asked for more pictures, I guess the broken hinge and dented bars wasn’t good enough, just to get a return granted. The return became a replacement. When the replaced arrived, same story. I didn’t bother contacting the seller the second time because the first was a hassle. This heavy duty crate has cheap bars and with a broken hinges won’t hold my mastiff. It was a waste of money, don’t purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kvella

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't perfectly fit together
customer_reviews.text: Grate does not fit perfect so it bangs around when the dog is in it. Spacing between walls and grate allow paws t fall through but my dog learned to avoid it. For the price and quality of material I'd expect pieces to fit perfectly and nothing have enough space to bang around. One wheel hole was crooked so the wheel wouldn't screw in, so no wheels on. All in all this product would be amazing if they could spend more time on making pieces fit seamlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Very low quality finish
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has some mild crate anxiety which we has resulted in him escaping normal crates. This crate was durable in that sense. I wouldn't trust it if his anxiety was anything above just trying to escape and giving up after a few defeats. If your dog is very stubborn and determined... don't spend your money on this crate. We also clean it every so often and after just a few months of use, the paint started to chip away. After a year, it isn't really usable for our dog. The finish has completely come off and it is very rusted. I am worried for sanitary issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Product - QC needs some work
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice product. Easy to assemble and very sturdy. I don't think my Cane Corso will be breaking out of this one anytime soon. The only problem I have with the product is that there are a few sharp edges at some welds and some sharp metal shavings as well. Some areas of the finish looked worn and areas had some of the coating missing entirely ( two spots about the size of a quarter). Some of the pieces had small dents. None of these issues have an impact on the usability of the product. With all that said, this is definitely a product to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge L Pupo

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This was the worst purchase I have ever made. Customer service won't stand being the locks that are easily shaked unlocked allowing our German Shepherd to get out. The locks won't stay locked when our dog moves around the shake loose and she pops the top open or used her nose to slide them up. Not hard at all. Don't waist your money on this kennel.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Hackler

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Nice Looking
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was fairly easy although two of the welds on the crate broke off immediately :/ I zip tied those together so it should be okay but would have been nice if the quality of the welds had been a little better for the price. Overall......it is a nice looking crate and my GSD likes it. I put a blanket in on top of the grid because he is crate trained and doesn't make messes inside his crate.
customer_reviews.author: Kim L.

customer_reviews.title: Great cage - make sure you build it in the room where it will stay
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps I ordered too big of a cage (ordered the largest), but I am extremely pleased with this purchase. The cage was too large to cart between some of the rooms due to cage being wider than some door frames, so make sure you build it in the room you'll want to keep it in. Otherwise you'll end up like me; having to take it apart just to move it in the next room.
customer_reviews.author: S Reed

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed and not functional at all.
customer_reviews.text: One hinge is missing a pin and one hinge isn’t even welded on. I’ve contacted the seller to see if they can fix this, but so far it’s a $200 piece of garbage that’s absolutely useless. UPDATE: they offered a $30 compensation to keep the crate as it is. ARE YOU JOKING? They tried to say that two non functioning hinges “does not affect normal use”. I would steer incredibly clear of this seller and item. I am hoping at the very least they will assist us in getting UPS to pick up for return, since it’s such a large item.
customer_reviews.author: RAD Rescue

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 german shepherds that chewed through or mangled their plastic and wire kennels so I bought 2 of the large kennels. They are durable! Two of the 4 wheels lock into place. Plenty of room for my girls to be comfortable. Only downfall is the latch.... it works but doesn't have that durable look. One of my girls has figured out how to get out so I had to put a lock on hers. I would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Deb G

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT! For a large Great Dane.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Great Dane, he loves it actually goes in without being prompted. Lots of metallic paint sand size pieces in the box open it outside or have a vac handy. I did have to bend/force a small joint while putting it together. It looks really nice put together, the pan catches hair dirt and anything that falls off the dog.......its easy to remove and clean.....dog will need a bed or padding inside as its uncomfortable screen but this is a tip notch item.
customer_reviews.author: StayAtHomeMom,Wife,AndFarmer!

customer_reviews.title: Paint chipped and it rusted
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a sturdy item and I had such high hopes for using it in the dog rescue but it started peeling paint off and rusting after the first puppies were housed in it. Now I’m afraid they will eat the paint chips not to mention it has rust all over it now. I wish I could get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: American Angie

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this company! I bought two of these cages and absolutely love them. I have two 1 year old, very destructive German Shepherds that have literally destroyed about everything I own and every crate that I have put them in. These cages have been a life saver!! One of my dogs did however manage to tear up the grate that he stood on trying to get to one of his bones. I contacted the company to see if I could buy a replacement. They asked for some pictures and sent me a replacement for free. I highly recommend this company and their products!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My go to !
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this twice! Best thing ever and still have it ! Though my dog did escape the top but I use zip ties and works fine!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: I spent over 200 dollars! Save your money
customer_reviews.text: The cage it’s self is very sturdy. But the locks are so cheap it’s not even funny !!! My dog broke out 3days in a row . 2nd day I zip tied it he escaped with his paws hurting him and nose scraped up I was not happy . So it’s the weakened I thought my big boy can heal up . So he’s getting out from the top now we tried something else today didn’t work. I’m a little frustrated. So their product is terrible and your dog could really get hurt. Beware!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great product....BUT
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My Boxer was able to get out of all her crates. This one is def heavy duty. BUT the latches need improved. She was able to scratch at them and get out. I had to put my own latches on them. Otherwise it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Weatherby

customer_reviews.title: I have an 8 month old 100 pound Alaskan Malamute ...
customer_reviews.text: I have an 8 month old 100 pound Alaskan Malamute puppy and this is the only crate large and stout enough to properly accommodate him while I am away. This cage appears to be nearly identical to the Empire model which costs twice as much. So far I am loving my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff LeMond

customer_reviews.title: Crate seems sturdy but for Chiwawa
customer_reviews.text: I assembled the crate about 12 midnight Sunday and lock my American Staffordshire in it. The following morning 630 am he was waiting for me at the back door. He had pulled out two of the rails and escaped. Crate seems sturdy but for Chiwawa.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many kennels, but this one is the best! It is very sturdy and much nicer looking than the wire cages. The grated bottom has been wonderful for new puppies. The pee and poo goes through the grates so your babies are not laying in it. Cleaning is easy. The tray is metal and will not crack like the plastic ones do. I would purchase this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Best large dog crate ever
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in February for our GSD who had broken out of every crate we bought for him, even if they were zip ties shut. Well not this one, this crate is so sturdy, latches are sturdy, crate is super well made and it's on wheels, you will get no better crate for your large breed dog.
customer_reviews.author: charles vinson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Kennel. I have Siberian Husky puppy and she ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Kennel . I have Siberian Husky puppy and she broke to large kennels from the pet stores . This one is awesome and she does not try to get out anymore .
customer_reviews.author: Terry M. Witte

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: We actually used this product to transport goats, to buyers or the vets. Fit perfectly in my truck bed and plenty strong for the animals. They don't work too break out and are not left unattended for long. I also have a 90lb German Shepherd that fits nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this price
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and the price is good. Although my Money does not like to stay in it, the overall is still a good iron cage
customer_reviews.author: Kuen  Chan

customer_reviews.title: Sliverylake Dog Crate
customer_reviews.text: Can’t really beat this for the price! Needed a cage to keep the breakout artists at bay. This looks great and does the job nicely. I’ve read reviews with the locking mechanisms being bad but honestly if you just add a padlock to the ends your golden. I have a pit bull and a yellow lab, and if I wanted to put them both in one cage this is spacious enough that they both can lie down! Great product and sellers respond fairly quick to emails if need of any service.
customer_reviews.author: Bturner

customer_reviews.title: Crate not sturdy as stated!!!
customer_reviews.text: This crate is no where near as sturdy as they claim. From the beginning we had issues with the grate our dog stands on. It broke apart and we had to get a replacement. Now, one of the cross bars that supports the grate has broken on one end. The welds are not sturdy whatsoever. Very disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: David Carrizales

customer_reviews.title: 50/50 chance!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great kennel if all of the parts came with it. It appears when my kennel was assembled they forgot to install brass fitting which capture the bolts for the locking mechanism. So now I have a kennel that won’t close!!!! Reached out to amazon they wanted photos however there is no place to upload photos in the customer service site!!! If you order one hope and prey you get all the parts!!!
customer_reviews.author: Caryn L. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Tough enough to keep your dog safe
customer_reviews.text: This cage has kept our storm fearing dog safe and contained while we are at work. We get horrible thunderstorms every afternoon in florida. He broke out of/ripped the door off of a crate made for airplane transportation. He's crazy when it storms and this cage is open so I think him being able to see keeps him calmer and it is super tough. He has ripped apart every other cage we've put him in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit through many doorways so put it together in the room you want it in.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing dog kennel. It is heavy duty. Have you seen those dog kennel that dogs can dig and chew their way out? Well this one is not one of those. Great quality and fast shipping . Seller gets a ten and the product gets a ten plus .
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away!!!
customer_reviews.text: Did not last over a year. My dog was able to take all the coating off exposing bare metal and having this crate rust. He was also able to bend and remove multiple bars over time and now has rendered this crate useless. If your dog has anxiety or likes to escape, get a better crate! Now I'll go spend $700 on a proper one as I should have in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Spencer

customer_reviews.title: My Great Dane fit in the 48 inch kennel.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good product only problem I’m having is the grate is flimsy and breaks easy. So far I have bought three for all three of my dogs to be crated overnight and while I’m gone and I have issues with two of the grates.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Large Dogs
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cage to hold large dogs while drying with a cage dryer. This one is perfect. They have room to move around in it.
customer_reviews.author: L. M.

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Very affordable and durable product. Worth your every penny. Quick and efficient service.
customer_reviews.author: Troy You

customer_reviews.title: Quality doesn't come cheap
customer_reviews.text: My dog has really severe separation anxiety and destroyed two other crates. He won't be destroying this one and he actually seems more relaxed in this crate
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mastiff/pittbull
customer_reviews.text: Best dog crate out there. I have a mastiff/pit bull mix and the escape artist could not figure this one out. He had plenty of space and was comfy.
customer_reviews.author: kevin  Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Strong and escape proof kennel. We have a huge monster of a dog who destroyed her basic kennel even after we reinforced it. She has no hope of destroying this one. We joke and call it our lion cage. It arrived promptly, in less than a week
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Hinges on the kennel door
customer_reviews.text: The Hinges on the kennel door are light duty and small. So small the welded area is weak and broke out of the square tubing in less that a week of use. The seller was great in getting us the front panel replaced. But the welds on the hinges is the weak link in this kennel. Rest of the kennel is built strong.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Butchee

customer_reviews.title: The Wall Hinges are weak.
customer_reviews.text: The wall hinges???? They need some work, but I figure if it’s only folded and unfolded ONCE, it should be ok. I am a little scared they may not last beyond that.
customer_reviews.author: jeanete freesene

customer_reviews.title: Strength!!
customer_reviews.text: So for so awesome! Holding up to our puppy boxer. Strong and effective. Only suggestion, upgrade the door locks.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Not worth injury
customer_reviews.text: The design allowed my dog to be able to repeatedly jump against the crate and injure shoulder. Do not recommend. Really saddened by his injury. To top the injury, 2 vet billS along with medicine. I am left a crate I am afraid to use. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff D

customer_reviews.title: Great Kennel
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! My dog cannot pull this one apart. Study, rolls easily, large enough for my small dog and my big guy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, not indestructible.
customer_reviews.text: Great for my calm 87lb German Shepherd, but might be slightly sub-par for less calm dogs. Most dogs would have a hard time escaping this, but it is NOT of the same "indestructible" class of similar designs. Still great and heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: The Disavowed

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money cheap material within a year the metal is coming out because of rust
customer_reviews.author: m&m

customer_reviews.title: Poor designed locks and tray
customer_reviews.text: It took my dog 5 minutes and she destroyed the bottom wire grate. It is very thin and cheaply made. The locks are just a bar that lays in a channel. Put a snap on them or secure a chain around the doors. The rest of the cage is heavy duty bars and the wheels are very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product and it was broken. They sent the wrong replacement part and it was also broken. In less than a year this crate has fallen apart and almost injured the dog in it. I will never buy one of their products again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Latches Are Garbage
customer_reviews.text: The kennel is heavy duty and great for my dog with separation anxiety. The latches for the kennel however, are worthless. You think with a heavy duty kennel it would come with heavy duty latching mechanisms. That’s not the case. My dog still broke out of the kennel and destroyed things in the house. I recommend that if you do purchase this kennel, go out and buy your own latches or find an alternate way for keeping the kennel closed and secure.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: This product does not hold up over time and company doesn’t stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kennel 1.5 years ago and came home yesterday to find my dog had bent one of the bars completely in half with his teeth and had wedged himself between the remaining 2 bars in an attempt to escape. The company is unwilling to back their product because the warranty is only for 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: Signe severs

customer_reviews.title: Best Cage & Best Company
customer_reviews.text: This is an AMAZING company. I have ordered crates from them for each of my dogs. Each order arrives within two days! Every piece comes packaged very nicely and assembly is a breeze. These are the best crates on the market. The price may be high, but it is worth it for the quality. They are the first crates I've ever found that are tough enough to contain my pit bull, English bulldog, and blue tick hound!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice awsome i definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love it best investment for my dog ever shes 60 pounds she loves it plenty room and then some
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Baker

customer_reviews.title: Front gate latches loosen and don’t stay latchesd
customer_reviews.text: The latches on the front gate loosened up and don’t even keep my dog locked in the cage. For that it’s not worth the money at all. Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but......
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy cage.. however the paint on this thing is horrible. I used this after the puppy welping box and the puppies who nawed at the cage peeled the paint off the thing. it came off in chunks. I have some section of raw rusted steel about a foot in length in some sections.
customer_reviews.author: Canard H.

customer_reviews.title: Good cage, just add extra lock
customer_reviews.text: We like the cage, could have a better lock mechanism, smart dogs can open it easily, we use a very large padlock on door for extra security, yes ours figured out how to get out.🙄
customer_reviews.author: passing time

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!!
customer_reviews.text: This cage has been a lifesaver! So glad I bought it. Our German Shepherd mix has severe seperation anxiety and was getting out and destroying other cages. Not with this cage The only bad thing I can say is the latches are not very good. We added an additional latch and it works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rileysmom

customer_reviews.title: Great large dog kennel
customer_reviews.text: Easy to move around and easy for larger dogs to turn around in
customer_reviews.author: Raelynn Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well built
customer_reviews.text: Extremely strong and well built. Doesn’t fit through a standard door way when set up.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy shine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our headstrong and muscular pit baby. The only "cage" that will hold him!
customer_reviews.author: Gx2

customer_reviews.title: Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Not a big fan of the latch system. Had to use a little force to align and center the pieces. With my dog being 160 I imagined the locking system would be just as sturdy as the cage but it is not. My family and I do love the cage though ands it’s by far the best one I’ve bought in 5 years!
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Cage is well built and sturdy but locks are not very good my 130lb dane ...
customer_reviews.text: Cage is well built and sturdy but locks are not very good my 130lb dane broke thru the locks in a day
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Purden

customer_reviews.title: Bottom fell through in less than 60 days. Garbage. Customer service doesn't care.
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Bottom broke after less than 60 days. Contacted customer service and they asked for pictures. I sent them and haven't heard anything in 3 weeks. For this price this item should last more than 60 days! Terrible terrible terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Misty N Chapman

customer_reviews.title: The latches are weak!
customer_reviews.text: The frame is great so far but the latches suck if they would put two heavier latches on the top door even on the side door
customer_reviews.author: Rex Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Just sad
customer_reviews.text: The item showed up and the box was already tore up and had been taped funny once i opened it the weld had been broken off the front and the wheels where missing 220$ not worth it
customer_reviews.author: nicole guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Cage
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that sucks is that this heavy duty cage has flimsy locking mechanisms
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: This has been amazing! We bought for our 100 pound German shepherd ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been amazing! We bought for our 100 pound German shepherd as he was escaping his other metal crate. This works great! Lifesaver
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy duty! Directions and tools were meh
customer_reviews.text: Great kennel! Only a few issues. Wrong tools sent...supposed to be a double sided wrench not a single. No directions to install the locks. My German Shepard bent the bottom lock on the first day. All in all it's what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is the only kennel my dog hasn’t destroyed! He’s a 65 lb mixed breed. This is the 5th kennel I’ve tried and the only one he hasn’t torn up.
customer_reviews.author: MO3S

customer_reviews.title: Locks suck. Other than that its Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The crate in itself is very sturdy and heavy duty and holds the dog the locks are ridiculously weak and they end up taking chain and wrapping around the door and padlocking it shut so that she cannot get out she can't get out of the top because it goes to the top and the door other than that though I'm very pleased with the product
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We didn't know how our Cane Corso would take to his new crate but he loves it. Its sturdy, strong and very well made. Especially for a breed like his.
customer_reviews.author: Find Deals 24/7

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Game changer. My dog has plenty of room. I bought a carpet to put in it which works great. She's an escape artist so this has been very good for us.
customer_reviews.author: Courtni Buck

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for Big Dogs
customer_reviews.text: This crate is perfect for our huge dog. He was always able to escape from any weaker crate and he really likes the space in this one to the point he will go in by himself just to relax alone! We had a minor issue and they quickly helped out and fixed everything as well, so amazing customer service.
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: Crappy cage
customer_reviews.text: every hinge was welded crooked. Only half of the hardware was included. The latching mechanisms are too light duty for the size dog the cage is meant to hold. Overall very displeased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James Ely Vinegas

customer_reviews.title: Very durable for dogs that escape
customer_reviews.text: My boxer got out of all the other wire cages we’ve had and he doesn’t get out of this one and he’s also more calm in this one and feels safe and secure in it. He has less anxiety being in this cage than a wire one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cane corso
customer_reviews.text: It took my dog a week to break all the welds on the top door
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Halterman

customer_reviews.title: Horrible latches do not keep door secure!
customer_reviews.text: The cage itself is strong but the matches are horrible and just jiggle loose and fall open on their own! This then releases the door allowing the dog to escape at anytime.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kennel
customer_reviews.text: Great kennel for our 70 lb chocolate lab. Our border collie actually loves to join him in the kennel now too, so it holds both of them comfortably with plenty of room to stretch out. Neither have escaped or bent any bars or latches. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, easy to put together and has plenty of room for my Cane Corso. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karen White

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t keep the dog in and very large and heavy
customer_reviews.text: The latch and locks do not keep the dog in all she has to do it hit the door or bop her head on the metal and it opens - we have to use clamps to keep shut
customer_reviews.author: Donna garcia

customer_reviews.title: Love the wheels
customer_reviews.text: This is the best crate we have ever owned and love the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Alexsys Thompson

customer_reviews.title: It has worked great for us
customer_reviews.text: It has worked great for us. I do wish the latches were a bit more sturdy, but all in all works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff H.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my escape artist. Plenty of room for him to stretch out.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Laverick

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: Putting this together was a complete headache. Most of the bolt holes didn't line up and I ended up having to zip tie the top down. And YES I made sure it was as square as possible, which is hard since the holes don't line up. My dog is VERY smart and figured out how to push out the tray and ESCAPE. Nice work guys, 2 thumbs down
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Zunno

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: This is the best made crate I've had, my dog is a german shepard and she ate 1 crate and 2 doors. It keeps her safe and my belongings in tack. The only problem we had was she could push the bottom tray out, so after she's in it we position it again a wall so she cant push it out.. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, The latches/Locks not so much. very cheap and bendable locks.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Dane still broke through this. Metal is soft and hollow
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great crate
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sturdy well built. Easy to read directions. Should not have casters. The tray easily slides out so we had to adjust for that since the dog can figure this out on his own.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdy so far..
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be sturdy so far. There was one piece that the weld was broken when we opened it.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Almost boxer proof
customer_reviews.text: The clasps to close it are very easy for my dog to open..we put carbinas and that works just fine..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best Quality, Price and Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about these crates and the customer service offered with them : )
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, but my German Shepherd could unlock it
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, but my German Shepherd could unlock it. I bought some chains and clips and fixed that easily. Otherwise, perfect and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry F. Guyton

customer_reviews.title: metal crate
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. first crate my german shepherd couldn't bust her way out.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Silver

customer_reviews.title: Buy a mattress
customer_reviews.text: You have to have a bed inside it or your puppy will get their toes fought in the grate
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My big bully dog loves his cage and easy to slide poop out of cage!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and un-escapable
customer_reviews.text: Works great I love that it’s on wheels makes it easy to move to clean underneath.
customer_reviews.author: aspen2004

product_meta.title: walnest Dog cage Heavy Duty Crates Pet Kennel for Large Dogs Double Door w/Metal Tray Lockable Wheels Exercise Playpen Steel 37'' 42'' 48'' 63'' Black/Silver/Brown
feature_bullets: ①STURDY AND DURABLE: This heavy duty dog kennel made of rust and corrosion-resistant steel. The indestructible dog crate is strong and durable, hard to be damaged.Nontoxic finished surface keep your dog healthy and render excellent anti-rust ability.
②LOCKABLE WHEELS: 4 wheels for convenient portability and easy storage. Contains 2 lockable wheels to prevent accidental movement and keep your dog crate securely in place.
③EASY TO CLEAN: Removable (slide-out) plastic tray helps you to catch the fallen dog food and excrement,and allows you to wipe and clean easily.
④EASY TO INSTALL: All hardware included,just need to fit it with four wheels and screw bolts, locks were pre-assembled.Just takes 3-5 minutes to complete.
⑤DOUBLE DOOR DESIGN: Front door design makes our dog easier to enter and easy to feed your pets. Top door make it easy to interact with your pet.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
